body: Sonya Rehman, who spoke at a TEDxKinnaird event in Lahore, comments: "In Pakistan these days, TEDx has become a big deal what with numerous colleges/universities putting together their very own independent TED Talks.

title: Pakistan: TEDx Events Proliferating

sentence: Sonya Rehman, who spoke at a TEDxKinnaird event in Lahore, comments: "In Pakistan these days, TEDx has become a big deal what with numerous colleges/universities putting together their very own independent TED Talks.
